title: Delegation
content: How many programmers does it take to change a lightbulb? A. None - It's a hardware problem

title: Loops
content: Hower to keep a programmer in the shower forever? A. Show him the shampoo bottle instructions: Lather, Rinse, Repeat

title: Arrays
content: Why did the programmer quit her job? A. Because she didn't get arrays

title: Hardware vs Software
content: What is the difference between hardware and software? A. You can hit your hardware with a hammer but you can only curse your software
